Title: Magento remote code execution (RCE), Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and other vulnerabilities
Description: Magento Commerce and Open Source 2.2.5 and 2.1.14 contain multiple security enhancements that help close authenticated Admin user remote code execution (RCE), Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and other vulnerabilities.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.1 before 2.1.14, all versions starting from 2.2 before 2.2.5
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.1, all versions starting from 2.1.14 before 2.2, all versions starting from 2.2.5
